content: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with Shadow PC! We're glad to hear that our service was able to provide a solution for your gaming needs and that it was relatively easy for you to use and access, despite not being the most tech-savvy. We value customer feedback and are constantly working to improve and make our service more user-friendly. We're glad we could make it possible for you to run steam games on your Oculus and we hope you will continue to have a great experience with our service. Thank you for choosing Shadow PC!
